## **Description**
The **Date Time Info **operator allows to return specific information about an input date.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

Date

The date for which you want to obtain specific information

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

Number

The requested information about the input date

## **Settings**
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- From the **Format **drop-down menu, select the format to use for the output date.

> Tip

Click![](data:image/png;base64,) (**Add item**) at the bottom of the drop-down menu to add a custom value to the list, then click ![](data:image/png;base64,) to confirm.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

- From the **Locale **drop-down menu, select the preferred language settings that the operator will use when returning the output data.

> Note

By selecting the "Default" option, the operator will use the language settings defined at runtime.

- From the **Info **drop-down menu, select the information about the date that the operator will return in output.

- Click **Apply **to confirm.

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**Input is INCONSISTENT with expected data**

The operator returns an empty string. The system logs a warning event.
